With Orbit 0.9.9, your personal relationship assistant just got incredibly powerful. Now you can truly make Orbit your own â€“ customize your contact packs, add your own unique fields, and transform how you track relationships. Whether it's adding custom fields, tracking key details, or creating personalized connections, Orbit adapts to your world, not the other way around. Customize. Personalize. Connect!

âœ¨ New Features & Improvements

ğŸ“¦ Pack & Field Management

  • Add, remove, and customize fields with unprecedented flexibility

  • Add custom fields tailored to your unique needs

ğŸ¤– Intelligent Assistance

  • Smarter answer generation for your queries

ğŸ”” Notifications & Updates

  • Comprehensive notification settings

ğŸ“… Feed Improvements

  • Ignore specific fields to personalize your feed
  • Refined display of upcoming events and information
  • Better handling of events like birthdays
  • More intuitive feed interactions

ğŸ› Bug Fixes & Enhancements

  • Fixed display issues with responses
  • Resolved birthdays without years tracking
  • Improved overall system stability and performance
  • Enhanced user interface responsiveness
  • Fixed issues with pack and field interactions

We're continuously working to improve your experience. Your feedback drives our development!

Update now and enjoy the latest improvements! ğŸš€
